channel.title: I have A Stupid question
channel.description:
How do i change the fighting xp rates? Also how do i change item prices? PLz help ME! I WOULD LOVE IT!@
TY JUSTIN!

item.title: I have A Stupid question
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“shoopdawhoop, post:3, topic:264140”]^ that DOES not help lol
open your item.cfg, and after an items Examine information
there should be 3 numbers
those are the buy\sell prices
i recommend just keeping them all the same

then with changing exp rate
open your client.java
and search “Exprate”
there are different exp rates for different items
(melee, range, and mage) be sure to change all of them[/quote]It does help. And about 80% of servers don’t have EXP rate, and there are more then 3 numbers. THAT DOES not help.

Read full topic

item.title: I have A Stupid question
item.dc:creator: @shoopdawhoop shoopdawhoop
item.description:
@shoopdawhoop wrote:

^ that DOES not help lol
open your item.cfg, and after an items Examine information
there should be 3 numbers
those are the buy\sell prices
i recommend just keeping them all the same

then with changing exp rate
open your client.java
and search “Exprate”
there are different exp rates for different items
(melee, range, and mage) be sure to change all of them

item.title: I have A Stupid question
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

You don’t have a stupid question.
You have 2 stupid questions.

Item prices are somewhere in item.cfg, go figure that out. And changing fighting XP rates are simple.

Read full topic
